## Biography

Jessica is in her 5th year of undergraduate studies at the University of Toronto. She is pursuing a double major in Ecology and Evolutionary Biology and Biodiversity and Conservation Major with a minor in Psychology. In the James lab, she has assisted in the summer community outreach project trapping Spongy Moths across Ontario. Currently, she is working on a senior thesis regarding effective population estimates of Spruce Budworms.
